testcase.name: TC03 Background Kullanilabilmeli
testcase.system-out: * def baseUrl = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' .................... passed * def pathParams = '/posts/70' ............................................ passed * def requestBody = ....................................................... passed * def expectedResponseBody = .............................................. passed Given url baseUrl ........................................................ passed And path pathParams ...................................................... passed When request requestBody ................................................. passed And method Put ............................................................ passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And assert responseHeaders['Content-Type'][0] == 'application/json; charset=utf-8' . passed And assert responseHeaders['Connection'][0] == 'keep-alive' ............... passed And assert response.id == expectedResponseBody.id ......................... passed And assert response.title == expectedResponseBody.title ................... passed And assert response.body == expectedResponseBody.body ..................... passed And assert response.userId == expectedResponseBody.userId ................. passed
